hero.title:
Excellent Medicine
in the Austrian Alps
hero.subtitle: Dr. med. Guntmar Gradl and his team stand for top-class medicine in trauma surgery and orthopedics.

services.subtitle: Our Offer
services.title: Medical Services
services.description: Comprehensive diagnostics and therapy at the highest level.
services.card_trauma_text: Acute care for sports and leisure accidents. Fast diagnosis and treatment for a quick return to everyday life.
services.card_ortho_text: Conservative and surgical treatment of joint complaints. Specialized in minimally invasive procedures.
services.card_mri_text: State-of-the-art imaging diagnostics directly on site. Quick appointments and reports without long waiting times.
services.card_ultra_text: High-resolution sonography for radiation-free diagnostics of soft tissues, muscles, and joints.

doctor.subtitle: The Doctor
doctor.title: Dr. med. Guntmar Gradl
doctor.text: As an experienced specialist in trauma surgery and orthopedics, I attach particular importance to personal care and tailored therapy concepts. My goal is to sustainably improve your mobility and quality of life.
doctor.point1: Many years of experience in sports traumatology

clinic.subtitle: Private Clinic Ritzensee
clinic.title: Trauma Care
clinic.text1: As part of 'Trauma Care', the Ritzensee Private Clinic offers a comprehensive range of medical services. Surrounded by the breathtaking Austrian Alps, we create the perfect conditions for your recovery.
clinic.text2: Nationally and internationally recognized medical professionals and state-of-the-art equipment guarantee the highest quality in all areas.

footer.copyright: © 2026 Trauma Care Saalfelden. All rights reserved.

contact_page.badge_hero: We look forward to seeing you
contact_page.subtitle_hero: Make an appointment or ask us your questions
contact_page.emergency_text: In case of acute emergencies, reach us 24/7 at
contact_page.directions_car_text: From the A10 (Tauern Autobahn) exit Pongau/Bischofshofen, then B311 towards Saalfelden. Free parking directly in front of the clinic.
contact_page.directions_train_text: Saalfelden train station, then 5 minutes by taxi or bus (line 585).
contact_page.form_privacy_suffix: and agree to the processing of my data. *

faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Answers to the most important questions about your treatment.
faq.a1: No, you can come to us directly without a referral. As a private practice, we bill you directly. You can then submit the invoice to your health insurance for partial reimbursement.
faq.q2: How quickly can I get an appointment?
faq.a2: Usually we can offer you an appointment within 1-3 working days. In case of acute emergencies, we are available daily and can usually treat you on the same day.
faq.q3: Which services are covered by health insurance?
faq.a3: As a private physician, you will receive a detailed invoice from us that you can submit to your health insurance. Depending on your insurance, typically 50-80% of the standard rates are reimbursed. Private insurance usually covers the full amount.
faq.q4: Can I come just for an MRI examination?
faq.a4: Yes, of course. We also offer private MRI examinations without long waiting times. High-resolution imaging is provided in cooperation with Radiology Doringer directly at the Ritzensee Private Clinic.
faq.q5: What should I bring to my first appointment?
faq.a5: Please bring your E-Card, any existing findings, X-ray or MRI images, and a list of your current medications. If available, also a referral from your family doctor â€“ but this is not mandatory.
